source:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Nymet seems troubled by something.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
ファノヴの里のナイメは、気がかりなことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the carved wood earrings and the Ronkan lilybell to the girl with pigtails.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_TODO_01<tab>髪をふたつに結った少女に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FB001 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FB101 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the engraven ring to Nymet.
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_000<tab>Greetings, ally of Ronka. You have come at an opportune time. I am faced with a problem that I could use an outsider's assistance to solve.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_000異郷より来訪したロンカの同盟者よ、ちょうどよかった。
お前に頼みたいことがある。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_001<tab>Several days ago we sighted a young girl wandering the wood. We loosed warning arrows, and she fled back whence she came. However, she dropped these earrings in her haste.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_001先日、僕らの森にひとりの少女が侵入してな。
威嚇の矢を足元へ放ったら、尻もちをついて逃げ出した。
その際、このを落としていったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_002<tab>I bear no ill will toward her, so I would like to return them, but I cannot leave. If it is not too much trouble, could you bring them to their owner?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_002持ち主に返したいが……
矢を射かけた僕が、彼女の領地を訪れるわけにはいかない。
どうか、頼めないだろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_003<tab>As a sign of apology, I would like to affix a Ronkan lilybell to the earrings. They can be found growing in the woods of Yx'Maja. When you are done, please make your way to Slitherbough and find her. I believe she wore her hair in pigtails.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_003その「」に、
イキス・マヤエの森に生える「」を一輪添えて、
スリザーバウの「髪をふたつに結った少女」に渡してほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_004<tab>I apologize for requesting such a menial task from you, but as you know I have little recourse. I simply wish to put her heart at ease.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_004は、詫びのしるしだ。
お前にすべて任せて申し訳ないが、
その方が、彼女も怯えずに済むだろうから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_010<tab>When you have affixed the earrings with the lilybell, please bring them to the young lady in Slitherbough. I pray this sets her heart at ease.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_010その「」に、
イキス・マヤエの森に生える「」を一輪添えて、
スリザーバウの「髪をふたつに結った少女」に渡してほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLA03465_000_020<tab>What's this? Earrings? They aren't mine, although they are pretty. If it was a necklace I might've been tempted to lie, tee hee.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLA03465_000_020？
ううん、あたしのじゃないよ。
あたし、耳飾りよりも首飾りの方が好きだもん！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLB03465_000_021<tab>Earrings? Mine have been firmly attached to my ears as far as I know. A friend of mine was lamenting over something she had lost, however...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLB03465_000_021耳飾り、私は落としてないよ……。
でもお友達がなくしちゃったやつに、よく似てる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_022<tab>Hmm? A pair of earrings? It just so happens I lost my own while in the woods some time ago...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_022……？
うん、この前、東の森の方へ行っちゃったときに、
落っことしちゃって……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_023<tab>You didn't! You found them! And the lilybell is a masterful touch!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_023わぁー！　すごい！
が見つけてくれたの！？
それに、まで！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_024<tab>That Viis asked you to do this? I...I suppose she didn't mean me harm after all...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_024そっか、あのヴィースのお姉さん、
やっぱり本当は、すごく優しい人なんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_025<tab>It is as Master Matoya said. They uphold their duty as the wood's protectors with grave severity. They only reacted as they should have.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_025マトーヤさまがね、言ってたの。
「あの人たちも森を守るって大事な使命があるのよ」って。
その邪魔したら、怒られるの、当たり前だよね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_026<tab>Please, give this ring to the one who sent you. Tell her I apologize for my rudeness, and will be more careful when next I go into the woods.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_026、私の指輪、ヴィースのお姉さんに渡してくれる？
勝手に森に入ってごめんなさい、
これからも頑張ってくださいって、伝えてほしいの。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_030<tab>Please give my ring to the Viis by way of apology. It's the least I can give after I encroached upon their sacred space.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_SLITHERBOUGHGIRLC03465_000_030、私の指輪、ヴィースのお姉さんに渡してくれる？
勝手に森に入ってごめんなさい、
これからも頑張ってくださいって、伝えてほしいの。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_040<tab>You have returned. Did you find the girl?
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_041<tab>I see. She is kind as well as wise. I shall hang this ring from my neck as a keepsake, to remind me of her. You have my gratitude for everything you have done.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF006_03465_NYMET_000_041そうか、彼女は聡明で、心優しい子だな。
指輪は紐に通して、肌身離さず首から下げるとしよう。
僕のわがままをきいてくれて、感謝するよ。
